replies.body: Except for Elise, everyone's worth buying.
Would have said Azir if he wasn't getting gutted.
between kha and gnar, definitly gnar. my favorite few 6300 champs also include lulu, jinx, braum, nami, velkoz and thresh.
Hmm.. I personally like syndra, aatrox, and braum. They're all pretty solid. Diana is good too but i cant remember if she is 6300. Jayce is also a SUPER fun champ to play.

buy who you want, why do they have to be 6300 O.o
all that means is that they are more recent additions than the others

i personally vote you buy ahri as i think it would fit your already existing champion choices

My votes for Thresh...
If you only want Kha or Gnar, then my votes for Gnar because of his play making ability.
